roleset.name: rebuff, reject
roleset.note: SPURN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spurn' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'rebuff'. Why don't I have 'reject' yet? (from spurn.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: ESB spurned Inco and within five days ESB had a ``white knight''...
